= Building Instructions =

Requirements JDK 1.5.x and Apache Ant 1.7.x.

1. Check Out the Source Tree
{{{
> svn checkout http://fixparser.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ fixparser
}}}


2. CD Into fixparser Directory
{{{
> cd fixparser
}}}

3. Build with Ant
{{{
> ant dist
}}}
